title: Does Bill Clinton have an illegitimate son named Danny Williams?
subtitle: The story of the forgotten "90s" newspaper accuses Bill Clinton of the mother of a "love child" with a black whore who was revived in time for the 2016 presidential election.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Bill Clinton was born an illegitimate, mixed-race son named Danny Williams with a whore from Arkansas in 1985.
